document.full_text: a panel of experts set up to advise u.n. chief ban ki-moon on possible war crimes at the end of sri lanka's war against tamil tiger rebels delivered its report to him on tuesday, the united nations said.
document.title: u.n. panel on sri lanka conflict delivers report
lines_and_colors: a panel of experts set up to advise u.n. chief ban ki-moon on possible war crimes at the end of sri lanka's war against tamil tiger rebels delivered its report to him on tuesday, the united nations said.
